survey_name: Home Internet Service Provider Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess customer satisfaction with their current home internet service provider, focusing on service reliability, customer support, and overall value.

questions.question_text: Which home internet service provider do you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Ensure 'Other' includes an open-text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with an 'Other' option triggering a text input.

script.question_text: Which home internet service provider do you currently use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of your internet service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of your internet service?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the speed of your internet connection for your household's needs?
questions.client_notes: Ensure clarity that respondents evaluate based on their specific usage (e.g., streaming, gaming, WFH).

script.question_text: How would you rate the speed of your internet connection for your household's needs?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the customer support provided by your internet service provider?
answer_options: I have not contacted customer support
questions.client_notes: Include an option for respondents who havenâ€™t used customer support.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the customer support provided by your internet service provider?
answer_options: I have not contacted customer support

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for your satisfaction or dissatisfaction with your current provider?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights; ensure mobile-friendly text box.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason for your satisfaction or dissatisfaction with your current provider?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with a 'None' option; ensure checkboxes are clear.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current internet service provider to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question; use a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current internet service provider to a friend or colleague?
